alert.note: Alert for Chattahoochee; Muscogee (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 7:57PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Muscogee and central Chattahoochee Counties through 830 PM EDT... At 757 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Vista Terrace, or near Columbus, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, pea sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... North Fort Moore, Saint Marys Hills, Edgewood, Highland Park, Laurel Hills, Sand Hill, Battle Park, Vista Terrace, Columbus Metropolitan Airport, Kenwood, Custer Road Terrace, Benning Hills, Avondale, Benning Park and Carter Acres. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
